WORKFORCE
S.C.M. employ 640 people on a site measuring 198.579 acres. There are a number of day workers mainly in the offices working from 8.30 to 5.00.Plant operators work shifts - 8 to 4, 4 to 12, 12 to 8. Jewellery is not permitted and safety clothes and helmets must be worn by all employees in or near the plant. In many sections goggles are required. Each employee has 23 days holiday and 8 bank holidays each year and the employer provides a Welfare and Social Club in Cleethorpes. Safety measures are stringent and failure to comply results in instant dismissal.
